wikipedia_page.main:
John Bentley (1 March 1787 – 26 March 1859) was an English professional cricketer.  He was the brother of Henry Bentley.
Bentley was mainly associated with Middlesex and he made 13 known appearances in first-class matches from 1807 to 1817.

response: *John Bentley (rugby) (born 1966), English dual-code international rugby footballer

*John Bentley (musician) (born 1951), British bass guitarist for the UK band Squeeze
*The John Bentley School, Calne, Wiltshire, England
|Played in 67 first-class matches for a variety of sides, including 25 for England XIs. Brother of John Bentley.
